name: NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X
description:
The brand new point shooting game from Kuma the Bear's "NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER" series has arrived!

Aim for the gap when it appears! Get past the global security network!
This new installment maintains the awesome gameplay that propelled "NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER" to over a million downloads in just over a month, while providing you with new security blocks and stages to navigate.

Get past the obstacles in each stage and clear every World!

By logging into Facebook, you can check on your friend's progression in "NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X" and compare rankings on the leaderboard. It's a great way to connect with your friends!

"NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X" is free to play, but offers some items that can be purchased in-game.

《"NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X" Highlights》
◆ One-tap game controls are incredibly simple!
◆ Experience the thrill of timing a perfect shot through the gap!
◆ The more you play, the better you will get! Aim for ☆☆☆s on every stage!
◆ Use items to get through difficult stages!
◆ Connect with Facebook to check your friends' progress!
Play agains your friends and assist each other to enjoy "NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X" together!

Make sure to "Like" our Facebook page featuring update information and the latest news for "NIGHTBIRD TRIGGER X"!
https://www.facebook.com/NightbirdTrigger
